meanings.definition: A person who studies the physical principles underlying biological processes.
meanings.sent1: Biophysicists explore how living things work using physics.
meanings.sent2: Many biophysicists conduct research to understand how cells function.
meanings.sent3: The biophysicists at the lab were so focused on unraveling the mysteries of life that they forgot to eat lunch.
meanings.sent4: The biophysicists' minds were like finely tuned instruments, dissecting the secrets of nature.
meanings.sent5: In the world of science, biophysicists are the detectives solving the puzzles of life.

meanings.definition: Those who apply the methods of physics to biological systems.
meanings.sent1: Biophysicists use physics tools to study living organisms.
meanings.sent2: The biophysicists' experiments help bridge the gap between physics and biology.
meanings.sent3: When the biophysicists brought their physics textbooks to the biology class, everyone was confused.
meanings.sent4: The collaboration between biophysicists and biologists created a powerful synergy in research.
meanings.sent5: The biophysicists' work sheds light on the intricate dance of physics within living beings.
